Class SystemExitPreventer.NoExitSecurityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.SecurityManager
      • SystemExitPreventer.NoExitSecurityManager
  • Enclosing class:
    SystemExitPreventer
    public static class SystemExitPreventer.NoExitSecurityManager
extends java.lang.SecurityManager
    Custom SecurityManager implementation that throws an ExitError when System.exit() is called, preventing the JVM from actually terminating.
